main event: A sighting of multiple unidentified objects with white, blue, yellow, and orange colors occurred in the sky on May 8, 1962.
interesting points: The objects were observed traveling at high speed and disappeared from view after about 10 minutes., There were multiple witnesses who saw the objects clearly., The report states that there is no physical evidence available for the sighting., Witnesses reported that the objects maintained a constant speed and made no sound., Investigators concluded it was likely a self-powered projectile rather than a natural phenomenon.
witness description: various individuals including a housewife and an engineer from Indianapolis
